description:
As initiative that i lead and i ask to create a simple react native app that simply login into mifos system, pretty similar to the android ones.
1. See how the android app works
2. Try the android app.
3. Port the log workflow to React native.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8RpfL_9BUIM
4. Test all in android.
name: React Native Startup App.
